project.name: verify
project.description: Runs junit, pmd, checkstyle, findbugs, and javadoc, failing the build if problems found. Invocation: ant -f verify.build.xml

target.name: verify
target.depends: clean, compile, checkstyle.tool, junit.tool, javadoc, findbugs.tool, emma.tool, pmd.tool, emma.echo
target.description: Invoke analyzers, fail if any errors found.
